hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Deku Shield# and #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #the Fire Arrows# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Blue Fire Arrows#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

HC (Malon).text: You would be surprised at all the things you can Hookshot in the Spirit Temple!

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Ruto's Letter#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found in #Goron City#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Haunted Wasteland# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path of time.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Ruto's Letter#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Back Left Bombable Chest

SFM (Saria).text: ${12 68 31}Don't forget to stand up and stretch regularly.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Deku Shield# and #a Purple Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #2# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Shortcut Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Din's Fire#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Left Fake Wall Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #Morpha#.
